title: Twisted
description: From the dark mind of Kimberly A. Bettes comes this unsettling collection of 26 short stories, each more twisted than the last. The stories within will leave you feeling uneasy, shocked, and disturbed.This 48,000 word collection features these never before released stories:-Meat Market-Romance-Quiet-Fever-Poor Charlotte-A Whisper-Beautiful Life-A Souvenir-Bitten-A Hard Lesson Learned-Paulie Loves Peanuts-The Man and the Monster-Freckle Face-The Bend-A Shot in the Dark-Boys-Guest-Ready or Not-Under the Mimosa-Grizzled-Snow and Ash-The Lure-Judgmental-Grim Ends-Hot Date-Flicker*For mature audiences only.
author: Kimberly A. Bettes
